messages.content:
📌 Plurilogues (Classes 8–12)
🗓️ Sunday, 17th August 2025 | ⏰ 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM
🎯 Format: Tag Extempore + Face-off Finals

ℹ️ A multi-format English debate consisting of an extempore round followed by a face-off final between selected teams.

📖 Sample Rules:
• Each team will receive a word/phrase/term 10 minutes before the start.
• Speaker 1 delivers a 1.5-minute extempore speech.
• Speaker 2 immediately continues for another 1.5 minutes.
...

🏆 Awards: Top 5 speakers recognized and awarded, Best Speakers (Prelims, Semi-finals, Finals)...
📅 Plurilogues is scheduled on Sunday, 17th August 2025 at 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM.
